text.headline: Prima Banka Slovensko: Fraud Analyst
text.text: Started my career as a fraud analyst in a bank, in Retail Credit Risk Department. I was investigating potential instances of fraud within an organization. Analyzed data, monitored transactions, and used specialized software to identify suspicious activity and prevent financial loss.

text.headline: Prima Banka Slovensko: Credit risk analyst
text.text: After a year, I transitioned to a role focused on analysing credit risk. I assessed the likelihood that borrowers will default on loans or other debt obligations. I analyzed financial statements, credit reports, and other data to evaluate creditworthiness and determine the risk associated with lending.

text.headline: Prima Banka Slovensko: Senior Analyst
text.text:
In the end of 2014, I made a career shift by changing position to Senior Analyst.

My key responsibilities on this position were:

- preparation of regular and ad hoc reports for the Board of Directors, ensuring informed decision

- conducting client data analysis to support strategic business insights and loan approval processes

- drafting and implementing internal regulations to enhance company operations

- designing automation solutions to improve process efficiency and workflow optimization

- collaborating closely with the IT department to define software requirements and oversee testing phases

text.headline: ECCO Sko A/S: Junior RPA Developer
text.text:
As a Junior RPA developer, I was responsible for designing and implementing Blue Prism robotic process automation solutions.

Responsibilities:

-Analyzing business processes and identifying automation opportunities

-Developing and deploying RPA solutions using Blue Prism

-Collaborating with business stakeholders to gather requirements

-Providing support and maintenance for existing RPA solutions

text.headline: ECCO SKO A/S: RPA Developer
text.text: I was promoted to medior RPA Developer. In addition to my duties as a Junior RPA Developer, I also focused on the role of a Solution Designer, where I involved planning and architecting RPA solutions to meet business requirements effectively. I helped in creating a well-structured and maintainable automation. Also I played a key role in training younger colleagues.

text.headline: ECCO SKO A/S: Adopting Python and AI
text.text:
In 2025, I began exploring Python and its applications in AI and machine learning.

This involved:

- Taking online courses to learn Python programming

- Experimenting with Open AI and Azure Open AI libraries

- Working on personal projects to apply my knowledge
